argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_difin | |- ( A \ ( A i^i B ) ) = ( A \ B ) |
| 2 |  | #P_incom | |- ( A i^i B ) = ( B i^i A ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_difeq2i | |- ( B \ ( A i^i B ) ) = ( B \ ( B i^i A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_difin | |- ( B \ ( B i^i A ) ) = ( B \ A ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqtri | |- ( B \ ( A i^i B ) ) = ( B \ A ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_uneq12i | |- ( ( A \ ( A i^i B ) ) u. ( B \ ( A i^i B ) ) ) = ( ( A \ B ) u. ( B \ A ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_difundir | |- ( ( A u. B ) \ ( A i^i B ) ) = ( ( A \ ( A i^i B ) ) u. ( B \ ( A i^i B ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-symdif | |- ( A /_\ B ) = ( ( A \ B ) u. ( B \ A ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_3eqtr4ri | |- ( A /_\ B ) = ( ( A u. B ) \ ( A i^i B ) ) |
